about_the_game:
"Funeral of the Flowers" is the new DLC of Soul at Stake, including a new Devil "the Geisha", a new Gambler "Aoki", and a new map "Sakura Shrine".

EXTRA BONUS

The Geisha gesture x1, the Geisha's exclusive Trump x5, Aoki's exclusive Trump x5, Aoki's Trump 【Bystander】 x5.


NEW DEVIL: THE GEISHA

Envy and hatred are burning the heart. Lies and betrayal are wilting the flesh. Let the gorgeous garment and beautiful face adorn this ugly fate, smirking at this evil world.

DEVIL'S ABILITY

Normal attack: The Geisha may attack the Gambler immediately when an attack misses. The cooldown between the two attacks is shorter.

[Prajna]: Converts grievances into a Devil's Mask to curse the Gambler. It entangles and hunts down the Gambler wearing the mask. Once trapped by the mask, the Gambler can only remove it by finding and worshipping the Devil Buddha.
1. The Geisha can throw a Devil Mask that flies forward in a straight line, 10 seconds cooldown.
2. The Devil Mask can traverse obstacles, illuminating the Gamblers within 10 meters during flight. The aura of illuminated Gamblers will be revealed for 6 seconds.
3. The aura of Gamblers hit by the Devil Mask will be revealed continuously to the Devil, and their ability to hear the heartbeats is decreased by 5 meters. Gamblers who are hit by the Devil Mask can see the aura of the Buddha statue in the scene, and they can remove the effect of Devil Mask with the help of the statue.

THE GEISHA'S CHEATS

Lurking Death: Standing still for X seconds will make the Gambler's heartbeat of fear completely disappear. Man's conception of good and evil are just facades.
Invisible: Stands still for X seconds to enter an invisible state. The invisible beauty is not non-existent, it just has no meaning.

THE GEISHA'S EXCLUSIVE TRUMP

Aerial Ace: The Geisha may attack the Gambler again immediately right after she hit a Gambler cursed by the Devil Mask.

NEW GAMBLER: AOKI

A smile is just a mask of disguise, while love is simply a script of lies. Don't say that all of this is too hypocritical, as this world, polluted by selfish desire, is just a stage of deception.
He masters a variety of techniques for hiding and stealing hands, which gives him room to maneuver in the game.

AOKI'S CHEATS

Backup Card: Get an Ace immediately for consuming every X cards. One is bound to have a slip of the tongue if he talks too much. So, it is always best to have some reservations.
Deeply Hidden: If there are no cards in your hand for over X seconds, you will get 3 Aces automatically. It's not fraud if no-one finds out!

AOKI'S EXCLUSIVE TRUMP

Win-win: When dismantling a trap or healing a peer Gambler, all the Gamblers involved in the interactions will gain up to 3 Aces.

NEW MAP: SAKURA SHRINE

The name of this historic shrine is forgotten, not a single person remembers what god it was dedicated to.
Sin and blood have defiled this holy place of worship. It enjoys none of God's blessings and is mired in a miasma of evil and bitterness.
No one knows how many souls perished here, nor how many wraiths are buried in the shrine. In the quiet garden, the cherry blossoms fall, with each petal having witnessed a tragedy.
Only the God enshrined on the altar is more mysterious and ferocious than the shrine itself.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a chase and slash game mode that uses sharp or blunt weapons, the screen will have a blood splash effect on a successful attack and during the execution event. The setting option "Bloody Mode" is available in the game. Turning off the "Bloody Mode" can change the blood color to green and has a mosaic occlusion when executed.
